name: So Square ITCH.IO DEMO
description:
Think of a Hack & Slash combined with a Bullet Hell, This is probably what you get

~CONTROLS~

WASD or ARROW KEYS - Move

SPACE or Z - Mellee Attack

MOUSE or X - Ranged

LEAD PROGRAMING + ART 

StarBlades

LEAD MUSIC + ANIMATION

Demi
